A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is such an amazing movie. I had expectations going in\, and of course there have been fan theories since the release of The Force Awakens\, but I was surprised at just how blown away I was. Are there certain things I wish would've happened\, or a few small scenes that could've been changed? Yes\, but the entire movie was presented in a way that makes you want to experience the story instead of critique or find flaws. Absolutely phenomenal.
